EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Signing Up to Our New GoDirect™ Flight Planning Technology
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> CONFIRMATION Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for signing up to be one of the first to use our new GoDirect™ Flight Planning technology - the new service is almost ready!
Once the new service is ready, we will reach back out with the contact information you provided.
GoDirect Flight Services Honeywell Aerospace
